statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_events
SELECT event_name, tournament_name FROM virtual_reality_events
SELECT event_date, tournament_type FROM virtual_reality_events WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_name, tournament_name FROM virtual_reality_events WHERE tournament_type = 'Online'
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, tournament_name FROM virtual_reality_events WHERE tournament_type = 'LAN' ORDER BY event_name;
SELECT event_name, tournament_type FROM virtual_reality_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY tournament_type, event_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS event_count, tournament_name FROM virtual_reality_events GROUP BY tournament_name HAVING event_count > 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, tournament_name FROM virtual_reality_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%championship%';
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_score FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'tournament';
SELECT event_id, event_name, player_id FROM game_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tournaments WHERE prize_pool > 1000;
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date, winner_id, runner_up_id FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_score FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'tournament' AND event_score > 100 ORDER BY event_score DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, prize_pool, winner_id FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_date >= '2021-01-01' AND tournament_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_id DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, player_id, event_score FROM game_events JOIN tournaments ON game_events.event_id = tournaments.winner_id WHERE tournaments.prize_pool >= 1000 ORDER BY event_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE last_login < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Concert';
SELECT player_name, result_rank, result_prize FROM players p JOIN tournament_results tr ON p.player_id = tr.player_id WHERE tr.result_rank <= 3 ORDER BY result_rank ASC, result_prize DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, event_name, result_rank FROM players JOIN tournament_results ON players.player_id = tournament_results.player_id JOIN events ON tournament_results.event_id = events.event_id WHERE result_rank <= 3;

SELECT player_name, event_name, result_prize FROM players JOIN tournament_results ON players.player_id = tournament_results.player_id JOIN events ON tournament_results.event_id = events.event_id WHERE result_prize > 1000 ORDER BY result_prize DESC;

SELECT player_name, event_name, result_duration FROM players JOIN tournament_results ON players.player_id = tournament_results.player_id JOIN events ON tournament_results.event_id = events.event_id WHERE result_duration < INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location = 'London';
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_location, total_prize_money FROM tournaments ORDER BY tournament_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_country FROM players WHERE player_country = 'USA' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, player_name, score FROM results JOIN events ON results.event_id = events.event_id JOIN players ON results.player_id = players.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_location, total_prize_money FROM tournaments WHERE total_prize_money > 10000;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_country = 'USA';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, player_name, score FROM events e INNER JOIN results r ON e.event_id = r.event_id INNER JOIN players p ON r.player_id = p.player_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events;
SELECT game_name, event_prize FROM events WHERE event_prize > 1000;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY player_country DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_prize > 1000 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_country FROM players WHERE player_country = 'USA' AND player_join_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date, tournament_location FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_prize IS NOT NULL AND game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY tournament_date DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM games WHERE game_release_date < '2020-01-01';
